settings.description: MiiCoffee DF64 II Single Dose Coffee Grinder

settings.text: MiiCoffee Apex is an entry-level semi-automatic espresso machine. It has a compact footprint for new home baristas. It uses stainless steel inside out extensively. Apex comes with 550ml stainless steel boiler for brewing espresso. Apex brews espresso at 9 bar. It comes with barometer showing the extra brewing pressure. PID allows you to change brewing temperature. When it starts brewing it also display the brewing time.

settings.title: MiiCoffee Apex Espresso Machine
settings.text: MiiCoffee Apex is an entry-level semi-automatic espresso machine. It has a compact footprint for new home baristas. It uses stainless steel inside out extensively. Apex comes with 550ml stainless steel boiler for brewing espresso. Apex brews espresso at 9 bar. It comes with barometer showing the extra brewing pressure. PID allows you to change brewing temperature. When it starts brewing it also display the brewing time.

settings.title: D40+ Single Dose Coffee Grinder
settings.text: MiiCoffee D40+ coffee grinder is an entry level single dose coffee grinder. It comes with stainless steel 40mm conical burrs that deliver a consistent grind with minimal clumping. Using aluminum as main body material it has an attractive price tag but doesn't sacrifice the build quality. D40+ now has stepless adjustment and helps dial in espresso with ease.

settings.title: DF64 II Single Dose Coffee Grinder
settings.text: MiiCoffee DF64 II single dose coffee grinder is complete re-design of the old populate DF64 grinder. It integrated the best elements from DF64V and DF83. The three seated position for the upper burr carrier integrated wave spring makes the grinding chamber  absolutely stable. At the same time it achieves minimal retention at the new level.  The exit chute is equipped with plasma generator (aka Ionizer) that reduces static to non-existent. The integrated Anti-popcorn cover help increase grinding speed.

settings.title: DF83 Single Dose Coffee Grinder
settings.text: MiiCoffee DF83 coffee grinder is all purpose grinder working for a range of brew methods e.g. pour over, espresso, cold brew etc. DF83 is rated best coffee grinder between $500 to $1000. Thanks to its large burr size DF83 is suitable for commercial environment. It now comes with plasma generator (aka Ionizer) that reduces static.

settings.title: DF64V Variable Speed Single Dose Grinder
settings.text: MiiCoffee DF64V coffee grinder is small but mighty. The beautiful designed grinder uses CNC aluminum extensively. It covers all ranges of coffee beans, e.g. espresso, filter brewing and Turkish coffee. The grinder comes with DLC coated 64mm flat burrs. It delivers very low retention. The magnetic design of exit chute makes cleaning super easy.

settings.title: DF64P Single Dose Espresso Grinder
settings.text: MiiCoffee DF64P single dose grinder is designed for espresso only. It features the wood accents and comes with custom made 64mm flat burrs. This grinder has delivers zero retention and the finest adjustment.

settings.title: PT1 Portable Electric Coffee Grinder
settings.text: MiiCoffee PT1 portable coffee grinder is a small coffee grinder that can be carried around easily.With the full metal construction it is guaranteed to last longer. The stainless steel conical burrs that deliver a consistent grind. 80 click adjustment provides grinding sizes that covers espresso, pour over coffee to French press. The built-in 800mAh battery can last 15 to 20 grinds. It supports most fast charging USB-C chargers.
